english.segment1: Wipe the flesh away. From your eyes. Have you any. Understanding. Have you any. Understanding. These things we ponder. Death. Death. You will make your choice. Your choice. Your choice. These things we ponder. Death. Death. You will make your choice. Your choice. Your choices. Wipe the flesh away. From your eyes
english.segment2: Like a cold knife through your. Right through. Your skin. Who can forgive all. All your. Your sin. Like a cold knife through your. Right through. Your skin. Who can forgive all. All your. Your sin
english.segment3: Kill your own. Your own image. And take on a new one. Battle play corrupt. Human. Against human. Human. Against human. Wash. Wash. Wash. Wash. Wash your hands. Wash your hands. Wash your hands. Wash your hands
